languages.text: "Для случайно выжившего ты обладаешь феноменальной памятью и наблюдательностью".

traits.locale_text: "Для случайно выжившего ты обладаешь феноменальной памятью и наблюдательностью".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "You demonstrate exceptional powers of observation and recall for someone who just happened to survive."
languages.original_text: "Для случайно выжившего ты обладаешь феноменальной памятью и наблюдательностью".

traits.locale_text: "You demonstrate exceptional powers of observation and recall for someone who just happened to survive."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You demonstrate exceptional powers of observation and recall for someone who just happened to survive."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You demonstrate exceptional powers of observation and recall for someone who just happened to survive."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You demonstrate exceptional powers of observation and recall for someone who just happened to survive."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “对一个仅仅是碰巧幸存下来的人而言，你的观察力与记忆力实在是过于出色了。”
languages.original_text: "You demonstrate exceptional powers of observation and recall for someone who just happened to survive."

traits.locale_text: “对一个仅仅是碰巧幸存下来的人而言，你的观察力与记忆力实在是过于出色了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Tu capacidad de observación y tu memoria son excepcionales para solo haber sobrevivido por suerte».
languages.original_text: "You demonstrate exceptional powers of observation and recall for someone who just happened to survive."

traits.locale_text: «Tu capacidad de observación y tu memoria son excepcionales para solo haber sobrevivido por suerte».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「偶然生き延びたにしては、並外れた観察力と記憶力を発揮しているようですね」
languages.original_text: "You demonstrate exceptional powers of observation and recall for someone who just happened to survive."

traits.locale_text: 「偶然生き延びたにしては、並外れた観察力と記憶力を発揮しているようですね」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr legt eine außerordentliche Beobachtungs- und Erinnerungsgabe an den Tag, wenn man bedenkt, dass Ihr nur zufällig überlebt habt."
languages.original_text: "You demonstrate exceptional powers of observation and recall for someone who just happened to survive."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr legt eine außerordentliche Beobachtungs-und Erinnerungsgabe an den Tag, wenn man bedenkt, dass Ihr nur zufällig überlebt habt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Vous faites preuve d'un excellent sens de l'observation et d'une mémoire remarquable pour quelqu'un qui a survécu par chance. »
languages.original_text: "You demonstrate exceptional powers of observation and recall for someone who just happened to survive."

traits.locale_text: « Vous faites preuve d'un excellent sens de l'observation et d'une mémoire remarquable pour quelqu'un qui a survécu par chance. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Tesadüfen hayatta kalan biri için olağanüstü gözlem kabiliyetlerine ve müthiş bir hafızaya sahipsin."
languages.original_text: "You demonstrate exceptional powers of observation and recall for someone who just happened to survive."

traits.locale_text: “Tesadüfen hayatta kalan biri için olağanüstü gözlem kabiliyetlerine ve müthiş bir hafızaya sahipsin.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
